text: Jakob Balzert (6 January 1918 – 23 June 1997) was a German footballer who played for 1. FC Saarbrücken and the Saarland national team as a forward. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:1997 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:1. FC Saarbrücken players Category:Association football forwards
title: Jakob Balzert
